vague_description: Determine the optimal production strategy for a glass factory to maximize profit given machine time constraints and varying production requirements for different glass pane types.
detailed_description: A glass factory makes two types of glass panes: a regular glass pane and a tempered glass pane. Both require time on a heating and cooling machine. Both machines are available for a maximum of \var{MaxTime} minutes per day. It takes \var{TimeRegHeat} minutes in the heating machine and \var{TimeRegCool} minutes in the cooling machine to make one regular glass pane. It takes \var{TimeTempHeat} minutes in the heating machine and \var{TimeTempCool} minutes in the cooling machine to make one tempered glass pane. The profit per pane of regular glass is \var{ProfitReg} and the profit per pane of tempered glass is \var{ProfitTemp}. How many panes of each glass type should the factory make to maximize profit? What is the maximum profit?
target_objective: Maximize the total profit from making regular and tempered glass panes
target_constraints: Number of regular glass panes is an integer
Number of tempered glass panes is an integer
Number of regular glass panes is non-negative
Number of tempered glass panes is non-negative
Total time used in heating machine by regular glass panes cannot exceed MaxTime minutes per day
Total time used in cooling machine by regular glass panes cannot exceed MaxTime minutes per day
Total time used in heating machine by tempered glass panes cannot exceed MaxTime minutes per day
Total time used in cooling machine by tempered glass panes cannot exceed MaxTime minutes per day
TimeRegHeat minutes are required to heat one regular glass pane
TimeRegCool minutes are required to cool one regular glass pane
TimeTempHeat minutes are required to heat one tempered glass pane
TimeTempCool minutes are required to cool one tempered glass pane
target_parameters: Maximum daily usage time of the heating and cooling machines
Time to make one regular glass pane in the heating machine
Time to cool one regular glass pane in the cooling machine
Time to make one tempered glass pane in the heating machine
Time to cool one tempered glass pane in the cooling machine
